title: Bike Check: The Dare VSRu aero bike of Alexander Kristoff and Uno-X in the Tour de France
content:
Grizzled vet Alexander Kristoff rides the Dare VSRu aero road bike for the debut of the Uno-X team in the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Bike Check: The Dare VSRu aero bike of Alexander Kristoff and Uno-X in the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
